pageProduct.name: Nyal Cold Sore Cream 10g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Nyal Cold Sore Cream is a relief from the symptoms of cold sores & cracked lips. Soothes, heals and protects.

Nyal Cold Sore Cream provides soothing relief from the pain and itching associated with cold sores.

It also acts as a protective barrier helping to prevent cracking and drying so as to help healing.

Early application will, in most cases, help in the prevention and development of cold sores.

Size: 10g

KEY FEATURES

• Soothe, Heal, and Protect from Cold Sores and Cracked Lips
• Protection at first signs
• Trusted Aussie brand since 1911
• Clear ointment for clean application

Warnings

For external use only Do not use in or near the eyes. If redness, irritation, pain or swelling occurs, discontinue use and consult a doctor. Do not use if foil seal under cap is broken or missing.

Ingredients

Active Ingredients: Menthol 0.5% w/w
Camphor 1.5% w/w

Directions

Directions for use
Apply a small amount to affected area as required.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 30°C.

Storage Temperature: Below 30°C.
